newsitem.title: USA: Unocal debt raised by Duff & Phelps.
newsitem.headline: Unocal debt raised by Duff & Phelps.

text.p: Duff & Phelps Credit Rating Co said Wednesday it raised the senior unsecured debt of Unocal Corp to single-A-minus from triple-B-plus.
The company's commercial paper was raised to D-1-minus from D-2, Duff & Phelps said.
The action affects about $2.8 billion of debt.

Unocal's completion of the divestiture of its West Coast refining and marketing assets has provided the company with $1.4 billion in cash and $400 million in shares of Tosco Corp common stock, which Unocal expects to sell as soon as practical, Duff & Phelps saod.

The company plans to use the proceeds to reduce debt by $800 million. The company will end up with a stronger cash position and the debt reduction will significantly strength debt coverage ratios, Duff & Phelps said.
Unocal shares were up 5/8 at 39-1/8 Wednesday.
